group_1.textLeft: even if I throw everything away to go traveling,
I wonder, if I will ever find a place to belong in my travels...

group_1.textRight: I just told you!@You're never gonna find it again.
In the first place, it's not just that you throw it@all away on your own.
You don't even know what you're looking for, either.
So how are you ever gonna find a place to belong?

group_1.narration: What it is I'm looking for...
I don't want to be someone like Ayaka,@who has endless cheerfulness.
I don't want to be a calm and composed person like Ryo,@or someone that can make others smile like Ikumi.

group_1.textRight: You don't even know what it is that you're@dissatisfied with,
and yet you're still complaining about where@you are now?
There's only one word for that.@Arrogant.
It's all the same.
I mean, you're here with me right now
because you can't give your current place a@10 out of 10, right?
What a luxurious problem.
You don't know what kind of person you want to be,@what kind of things you want...
And despite that, you just keep saying "I want something else, I want something else!"
And if it's something you don't like even a little,@you run away from everything important.
What can you even call that besides "selfish"?
That's why we have to keep on searching.
We'll keep seaching for a nonexistent answer until@the day we die.
...I'll show you, who I really am

group_1.narration: -???-@See? I'll keep searching, forever and ever...
-???-@...For something that no amount of searching is ever going to find.

group_1.textRight: Right?@You get it now, right?
You'll never find it either, so let's hurry up and@go somewhere that isn't here.
Let's throw this current place away right now@and go on a trip together!
I'm sure that'll make you so, so much happier!
